title: Muqam chairs committee to resolve issues of Gilgit Airport victims
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 16 (APP): Federal Minister for Kashmir Affairs and Gilgit Baltistan and SAFRON Engineer Amir Muqam on Thursday chaired the third meeting of committee related to resolve the issues of the victims of Gilgit Airport.
The meeting was attended by senior representatives of the Ministry of Defense, Ministry of Law, Pakistan Airports Authority, and the Government of Gilgit-Baltistan.
Secretary Kashmir Affairs, Gilgit-Baltistan and SAFRON Zafar Hassan and Additional Secretary Kamran-ur-Rehman were also present in the meeting.
The committee reviewed the resolution of the issues of the victims of Gilgit Airport.
Federal Minister Amir Muqam reiterated the governmentâ€™s commitment to transparent and timely resolution of the issues of the victims.
